history.content:
I haven't taken 188, but I did take 170 + 16B (same workload as 16A) in one semester. Manage your time well and it should be ok - when I took them, the psets were both due on the same day, so I had to start at least one of them well in advance. 

----

I did this + another class.

I personally would suggest you not do this if you don't have to OR only do so if you think you will have enough time to truly dedicate to the course material, i.e. not have too many extracurriculars outside of studying . You HAVE TO manage your time very well and not fall behind.

CS170 and EE16A take a lot of time with HW and 16A also has labs. 188 projects and hw are not too bad but the tests are not easy.

This is definitely doable but will take full dedication and leave you little time for relaxation and extracurriculars. The biggest reason I suggest you not to do this because I believe it will take away the joy of truly learning and appreciating the material, as you will spend most of your time "getting things done on time" and learning just to get by the tests.

I haven't taken 188, but I did take 170 + 16B (same workload as 16A) in one semester. Manage your time well and it should be ok - when I took them, the psets were both due on the same day, so I had to start at least one of them well in advance.

The biggest reason I suggest you not to do this because I believe it will take away the joy of truly learning and appreciating the material, as you will spend most of your time "getting things done on time" and learning just to get by the tests.

history.subject: CS 170, CS 188, EE16A in one semester?
